attr_14: Yesterday's news about Alvin Lucier's death brought back some vivid memories of the retrospective we put on 5 years ago, and what a pleasure it was to be immersed in his work in the run up to that.  We made a choice to leave out 'I am Sitting in a Room' to throw light on... | nine lesser known pieces, which are all documented brilliantly as ever by Agata Urbaniak on this page: https://t.co/lpDKmcDHZ5  At the time there were some that we were sorely tempted by - Music on a Long Thin Wire, Bird and Person Dyning and the brainwave driven Music for Solo..
